message: AI tools can help streamline your practice but what are the risks? In this Justia Webinar, we’re discussing ways you can leverage AI tools to the benefit of your practice without losing your law license!

Join Justia Team members and attorneys Kara Simon and Marina Wilson on Monday, July 31 at 3:00 p.m. ET/12:00 p.m. PT for Practice With AI (Without Losing Your Law License), a presentation in which they discuss the relationship between AI and the practice of law, including practical uses for this new technology and ethical concerns of which lawyers need to be aware.
message3: Please note: This presentation is accredited for one hour of General MCLE credit in California. If you want CLE credit, you will need to upgrade to Justia Connect Pro to take advantage of this exclusive benefit.

In May 2023, a federal judge in New York discovered six fake cases cited in a plaintiff’s attorney’s brief. The lawyer claimed he used ChatGPT and was “unaware of the possibility that its contents could be false.” Don’t let that be you!

Join Justia Team members and attorneys Kara Simon and Marina Wilson on Monday, July 31 at 3:00 p.m. ET/12:00 p.m. PT for Practice With AI (Without Losing Your Law License), a presentation in which they discuss the relationship between AI and the practice of law, including practical uses for this new technology and ethical concerns of which lawyers need to be aware.
